name: SandersWingo
description: Sanders\Wingo uses behavioral science to create solutions for brands. We help find the difference between what people believe and what they do. We operate with an obsessive fascination with human nature and human decision-making. Our true passion has always been finding ways to change minds and behavior. We've created great results for AT&T, KFC, GECU, Ocean Alexander, Austin Independent School District, the El Paso District Attorney's Office and many other client partners.
